revised_title: Automated ECG Interpretation in the National Health Service
tldr: This article discusses the potential benefits of using automated ECG interpretation in the National Health Service. It compares the 12-lead and 3-lead ECG systems and recommends the 3-lead system for routine use due to its time efficiency and cost-effectiveness. The article also explores different recording techniques and choices for computer systems, emphasizing the advantages of using a central hospital computer for ECG interpretation.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical Technology
